lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.occupational_info: I work in Finance for an investment firm.  We manage money for wealthy individuals and companies.  The job puts many things into perspective regarding wealth on a relative basis....

lenders.name: Hugo

lenders.occupational_info: I help people with physical injuries to heal and recover.  I see all kinds of cases such as back pain, bone fractures, shoulder surgeries or ankle sprains. I assess and then give exercise programs for rapid recovery.

lenders.name: Danielle

lenders.loan_because: We have a wonderful life and this is a great opportunity for us to help others have a better life too.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Gavin
lenders.loan_because: I love to serve.

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: charlie
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Celina

lenders.occupational_info: I work freelance as a project manager and as an artist.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: sharing is the bread of life

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful gift to give. I love the Kiva initative. I love that the money is used for entrepreneurs wanting to make a difference in their own live and the lives of those that are close to them. They are not needy and begging, no they are active, thriving and creating a better live for themselfes and their family and sometimes their community. How marvelous is that!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I hear about this organization on Public Radio and thought - what a great idea.  I am looking forward to hearing about those who benefit from these loans.  Hopefully we will learn about each other and find that we all share some common values.
lenders.occupational_info: Well I'm retired now - but still try to keep active in the community.  I was a high school social studies teacher in a suburb of Detroit Michigan.  I mostly taught American Government.

lenders.occupational_info: Instant offense on the pitch (that's soccer/futbol)!

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: It connects me to a small corner of someone else's world

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It feels like I'm helping, in a small way,  to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and websites.

lenders.name: Alexander David

lenders.occupational_info: I lead a team of writers and designers who work together to create marketing materials that help sell our company's Internet technology.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world.

lenders.name: Theresa

lenders.occupational_info: I am a fundraising consultant based on Ontario.

lenders.name: Ken Altreuter
lenders.loan_because:
Lo único que hace falta para que triunfe el mal es que las buenas personas no hagan nada. Edmund Burke

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know that you're helping someone.

lenders.name: Michael and Mary

lenders.occupational_info: Mary teaches special needs students and Mike teaches students to use tools and machines in shop classes.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell a business.

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.loan_because: Happyness will become more, if you share it!

lenders.name: Marsha

lenders.loan_because: I like the world

lenders.name: Greg & Jill
lenders.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurs.  What a great way to continue helping people to become self-sufficient...

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: more meaningful for all parties than direct aid

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.occupational_info: I work with the elderly in nursing homes.  It's so rewarding to help people feel better and working with the elderly I receive so much!!!!!

lenders.name: Bob

lenders.occupational_info: I work with elders in a nursing home and I play therapeutic harp music for those that are ill and dying.

lenders.name: Trish & Steve
lenders.loan_because: We are lucky enough to be able to donate.

lenders.name: Jill & David

lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research to find out what people think about the healthcare they receive.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: if we help each other, we can make the world better!
lenders.occupational_info: making houses and workplaces for people!

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I am troubled by the uneven distribution of wealth in this world and the Kiva model seems to be a reasonable tool to help relieve the suffering caused by economic, social, spiritual, and physical poverty.

I am a volunteer for the international children's fund called Compassion.  In addition to sponsoring several children I am continually looking for others like myself who want to release children from poverty in Jesus' name.

lenders.name: Kay

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
It can make a difference for so many people, in 55 countries!

Give to everyone who begs from you, and do not refuse anyone who wants to borrow from you.  --Matthew 5:42

http://bit.ly/Golden_Rule

* 80% of humanity lives on less than $10 a day
* Over three billion people live on less than $2.50 a day
* 1.6 billion people — a quarter of humanity — live without electricity
* 790 million people are chronically undernourished
* 25,000 children die each day due to poverty 
...from http://www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

Change a child's life, be a sponsor. http://children.org

Learn more about Fistula - See the video From Despair To Dignity (5:08)  http://www.yaninamanolova.com/fistula/index.html 

Learn more about ovarian cancer. Educate for early detection.  http://ovariancancerin.org/
.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to have been born in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have serious mental health issues (such as schizophrenia, mood disorders, anxiety disorders) and/or addiction issues.

lenders.name: Fabio e Cristiana
lenders.loan_because: Crediamo nell'uguaglianza delle persone kiva fa in modo che ci siano meno differenze.
lenders.occupational_info:
Non è importante cio che facciamo nella vita, e importante solo avere dei sogni. 

Noi crediamo che kiva dia la possibilita , sia a chi presta sia a chi riceve, di coltivare sogni.

Grazie Kiva, non sei tu a dover ringraziare.

(Does not matter what we do in life, and only important to have dreams.

We believe that Kiva gives the opportunity both to lenders and to those who receive, to cultivate dreams.

Through Kiva, you do not have to thank.)

lenders.name: Justin

lenders.occupational_info: Assisting others to create and build new small businesses, which provide services to the federal government and allow both to make a difference in their lives and the lives of the American people.

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.loan_because: Its really cool.

lenders.name: Frederico
lenders.whereabouts: S D Rana S D Rana

lenders.name: Gerry and Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help on a personal basis.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair large Mining Equipment.

lenders.name: Lora
lenders.loan_because: I believe that severe poverty is the most pressing global issue of our time. I believe that I can make a difference by contributing to the economic activities and possibilities for entreprenuers working to get out of poverty.

lenders.name: Coach Alexia Vernon
lenders.loan_because: It enables me to leverage the resources in my life to make an impact in the lives of others. And honestly, it's just too darn easy and cheap not to!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I empower individuals, businesses, and communities to set aggressive and achievable goals and to design corresponding, innovative action plans to bridge the gap from where they are to where they want to be.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: Getting started with 2007 Christmas Gift Certificate.  Plan to add more with time.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a truck to get away from home and working too hard.  It is a way to rest up for me.  I will be 80 in March and still working at life hard.  Work keeps you young.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: its needed.  The value and utility of money is worth so much more to those that really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work helping the people of my community here in the US.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people with the means to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large company, in the department that goes to the market and tries to get the company loans.

lenders.name: Michael A. Thompson
lenders.loan_because: Direct loans to people have been shown to be more effective then out right aid to their governments.
lenders.occupational_info: In simple terms I allocate resources and create new businesses.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Some things are more important than money and material things.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time university student, studying History.

lenders.name: Eva J
lenders.loan_because: We all need a helping hand sometime. i love to see people want to get ahead to support themselves /family with dignity. There's dignity in work.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired R.N,   grandma who helps were i can with grandkids , church & community activities

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people less fortunate than I who need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Student.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I've had the good fortune of opportunity.  I believe that's a fortune that everyone should have.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am in the grateful position to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the one with the less serious look on his face...

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: to help change the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and manufacture medical devices

lenders.name: Marika
lenders.loan_because: I think other people in this world shouldn't be ignored. They should be helped with problems, know others around the world, and be educated just as much as other people. We should all be treated equally.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I am just 13, I don't have a real job. But I always have wanted to become a famous fashion designer. I sew constantly and draw many dress creations. I sing because I am in Bel Canto Choirs. It is mainly all singing, but we've performed musicals before.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: ...I like being able to help people in whatever way that I can, and Kiva makes it easy to extend assistance to those outside of the neighborhood.
lenders.occupational_info: ...I'm a college student studying elementary education, and I stay as active as I can in volunteer work both in and outside of the education system.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: It feels right to provide some assistance to those who are trying to improve their own lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in loaning to people who need money to better their lives.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I interpret for two deaf children at their school.

lenders.name: Ric
lenders.occupational_info: See my Google website.

lenders.name: Donna and Karsten
lenders.loan_because: We share because we can.  It is our obligation as fortunate people to help others. We specifically want to help women and their children around the world.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for people who need a little bit of monetary assistance to improve their lives on their own initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: Prior to staying at home to raise my son, I interpreted between patients who speak Spanish and doctors who speak English.

lenders.name: Dave & Beth
lenders.loan_because: This is a great idea

lenders.name: RebJonLiz
lenders.loan_because: My Uncle and Aunt gave me some money

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: there are millions of independent, ambitious, and intelligent entrepreneurs all over the world who have ideas for their own projects to better their lives. All they need is a small loan to put these ideas into action.
lenders.occupational_info: I study international business and economics at Dickinson College

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Nan & Brian
lenders.loan_because: This seems to be the best and most productive way to really make a connection through out the world. We are thinking globally!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach preschoolers,age 3-5 who live below the United States poverty level.Many of the families in my program come from South America or Mexico.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Our future is bound up together.

lenders.name: ShanDevKel
lenders.loan_because: My Uncle and Aunt gave me some money.

lenders.name: R&J
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: AidLiJulDecGab
lenders.loan_because: Our Uncle and Aunt gave us some money
lenders.occupational_info: We are good at silly-billying.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it is my own form of income redistribution. Many people at the lowest income levels of society get hurt by their countries politics and quite simply it is not their fault. So I want to help in my own way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at University of British Columbia and I own an Event Planning company.

lenders.name: Melissa Pogue
lenders.loan_because: I care about others & God asks me to.
lenders.occupational_info: Hardworking mom of 3.

lenders.name: tuan
lenders.loan_because: for the price of a few drinks, someone can have a chance at a better life. so, the question is why not?

lenders.name: Paul & Angela
lenders.loan_because: Like the concept and am glad being able to help!

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to use what I can to help others so that they might have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school science in an economically disadvantaged part of the USA to increase the chances that these young students might go on to college and better their place in life,

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do - to help others who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company on a specific computer system keeping it up-to-date and helping others who are having problems

lenders.name: Michael & Tina
lenders.loan_because: We are flowers of one garden.

lenders.name: Toshikazu
lenders.loan_because: My opinion is "Money is used for life to good thing not savings.".

lenders.name: smiling lion - tammalee
lenders.loan_because: It's contagious compassion - Pass it on!

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help. That is why I am in Health Care. Life has been very good to me and I would like to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people see the world around them by examining their eyes, making sure they are healthy, medicating them if needed and getting vision as clear as possible.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to do my part to help others.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I should.  I am blessed with a job, a home, and I should be helping those who are striving for the same things in a place where those things are twice as hard to come by.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to read and write.

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I see people and humanity not borders and geography.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a  student working towards my Graduate degree in Counseling Psychology.

lenders.name: Tanveer Akhtar
lenders.loan_because: We are a  small community group and have not access to local funds because we are in a remote community.
lenders.occupational_info: An entreprenuer group.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: it will reduce poverty.  It will improve lives.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do. Everyone needs a little assitance sometimes, and I am glad I am able to help out.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend Jesuit High School in California

lenders.name: Chris / Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We like to give people the opportunity to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Dallas
lenders.loan_because: They don't want handouts, they want opportunity.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Life has been very good for me, and I know it's largly because of my good fortune to be born and raised in the USA, How can you not pass some of that on?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired civil servant.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that I can actually see what is happening with the money I have donated (loaned). Even though it isn't a lot of money I do feel I'm making a difference for at least one other person in the world.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: A loan is a gift that keeps on giving--with one small wad of seemingly insignificant cash, a person can help a tremendous number of their fellow humans. Empowering people a beautiful thing.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.occupation: Case manager with Canadian Mental Health Assoc.
lenders.loan_because: I really believe in the ability of people to improve their own lives, but I believe just as strongly that everyone needs and deserves help and support to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support to people with serious mental illness - schizoprenia and related disorders, or bipolar.

lenders.name: Bob & cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is wonderful opportunity to reach out and help other self employed people throughout the entire world.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife Cheryl and I own a cleaning company located in Seattle Washington.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: What is unique about my work is that during the winter time I drive in the artic where the temp. gets down  to -55.  There are not any roads there so we drive on frozen lakes instead.

lenders.name: Jeffrey & Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help every person achieve their goals & dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people invest their money in order to realize their dreams.

lenders.name: ECO
lenders.loan_because: we have all been given countless opportunities in life and it is time we helped to provide opportunities for those less fortunate and for the good of the earth.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of energetic and motivated college students who meet weekly to work on projects to address environmental well-being both on our campus and beyond.

lenders.name: Aleks
lenders.loan_because:
Nothing is more exiting than seeing people succeed in their pursuit for better life.
They are not only helping themselves, the whole society around them will benefit. I’m more than happy to be just a small resting place in their journey.
lenders.occupational_info: Building energy efficient buildings for the future.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to make a small contribution that has a big impact on someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to improve the quality of life and natural environment of urban areas.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It is such a small amount for me, but can mean so much for someone else. So why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a researcher studying how information and communication technology can improve healthcare.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Leanna
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mother.  I've had to decide what we needed more - diapers or food.  Life can be difficult no matter where you live, but through the goodness of people it can be made just a little bit easier.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales.  I consult with companies to find business solutions that will help enhance their bottom lines.

lenders.name: Marcel V.
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Hans en Corine
lenders.loan_because: we want to share our well-being
lenders.occupational_info:
Hans was responsible for the sale of trucks in several European countries.
Corine makes flower decorations for churches and wedding-parties.

lenders.name: Sherron
lenders.loan_because: Wow! what a wonderful feeling to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick children in a major NYC hospital

lenders.name: Paul and Sue
lenders.loan_because: We got help from others to get where we are.  Giving feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach independence skills to people with vision problems.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: So others may realize their own personal and economic goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Brent: I work with computer systems.
